author: marcsaeg
msg: Added getPath() and getQueryString() to avoid dependencies on JDK 1.3.

author: marcsaeg
msg: Added support for connection timeouts (waiting for HttpConnectionManager
to find a connection) and SO_TIMEOUT values for HttpConnections.

author: marcsaeg
msg: Removed the JDK 1.3 dependencies.  URL.getPath and URL.getQuery() have
been replaced with URIUtil.getPath and URIUtil.getQueryString().

author: marcsaeg
msg: Added getConnection() method that accepts a timeout value.  If a connection
does not become available before the timeout expires an HttpException

author: marcsaeg
msg: The setSoTimeout() method can now be called before the socket is opened.
In this case, Socket.setSoTimeout() will be called when the new socket
